text: @StephenKing And protests(some massively lg)where "some"  ppl are wearing masks many aren't no social distancing or any other #covid19 safety measures used.Many states besides Calif in 2nd wave.Bars restaurants tattoo parlors gyms hair/nail salons opening all over the country.But #AllsGood 😖
